amendment.description: An amendment numbered 58 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Operations, Research, and Facilities funding by $1,500,000, and decrease funding for Department of Justice General Administration by $1,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Cunningham.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
